useEffect(()=>{// Regular background particles

const twinkleFactor=Math.sin(timeRef.current*particle.twinkleSpeed+particle.twinklePhase);const normalizedTwinkle=(twinkleFactor+1)/2;// Convert from [-1,1] to [0,1]
